name: backend
description: Hey Pet API built with Express + Sequelize + MySQL

scripts.prestart: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.populate: npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.clean: npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all

author: Vincenzo F. Di Giacomo
